name: Cel Rau
summary: You are a cel rau, child of a strigoi, one of the first vampires to walk Golarion.
description:
You are a cel rau, child of a strigoi, one of the first vampires to walk Golarion. Your heritage ties you to the Shadow Plane and grants you strange resilience to light and darkness alike. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against effects with the darkness, light, or shadow traits, and whenever you become dazzled or blinded for at least 2 rounds, you can reduce the duration by 1 round.Cel Rau Leads To...

Taste BloodTraitsDhampir: A creature with this trait has the dhampir versatile heritage. These humanoids are the mortal offspring of vampires and members of other ancestries.

Lineage: A feat with this trait indicates a character's descendance from a particular type of creature. You can have only one lineage feat. You can select a lineage feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain into or out of these feats.
